subject: Baseball (College)
Baseball
Colleges and Universities
NCAA Baseball Championships
lead_paragraph: A refurbished stadium and a new culture under Coach Brett Boretti have changed baseball at Columbia, which recently won the Ivy League title for the third year in a row.
snippet: A refurbished stadium and a new culture under Coach Brett Boretti have changed baseball at Columbia, which recently won the Ivy League title for the third year in a row.
